DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Clear Care® Plus compare PeroxiClear™ mean residual peroxide use lens case collect Day 30 neutralization recommend storage time .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants wear habitual lens daily wear basis use assign test solution daily lens care .
DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent form ; Adapted , 2week/monthly replacement silicone hydrogel contact lens wearer ( least 2 month ) ; Willing wear study lenses daily wear daily basis ( 7 day per week least 4 hour per day ) attend study visit ; Symptoms contact lens related dryness define Symptomatic PreScreening Questionnaire ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Current hydrogen peroxidebased solution user ; Routinely sleep lens least 1 night per week last 3 month prior enrollment ; Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Any systemic disease may affect eye exacerbate use contact lenses contact lens solution could prevent wear lens least 4 hour per day ; Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
